name: Save The World From The Virus
name_original: Save The World From The Virus
description:
CONTROLS:

W / A / S / D : MOVE

MOUSE : AIM

LEFT MOUSE : SHOOT

SHIFT : SPRINT

This was a solo project.

Unify up with people to build your army. Complete all 14 stages and defeat the boss virus.

14 stages of fun. Go kill that virus!

This game was created in 2 days for the Stay Safe! Jam. Every asset was created by me except for the music and sound effects, which were taken from the Stay Safe! Jam sound library that were made available to everyone.

Play in full screen!
